channel.title: Will changing the background image make a difference?
channel.description: the background image of my client is a image of runescape's logo and those two things with the multiple colored flames coming out and stuff like that, if i delete the background image in my client folder and replace it with a plain black picture, will it make a difference?

item.title: Will changing the background image make a difference?
item.dc:creator: @Kahl Kahl
item.description:
@Kahl wrote:

No, the flames and runescape logo will still be there.

You have to remove them in the client.java somewhere, but I’m not sure where.

Read full topic
item.source: Will changing the background image make a difference?
